description:
- Added a left and right rhythm guitar track
- Transcribed and tabbed all rhythm guitar parts after the intro riff
- Added, transcribed and tabbed the Bass Guitar track 
- Added, transcribed and tabbed the Drum track for the whole song
- Made a large amount of fixes to the solos
- Added the chorus leads
- Named the song structure with markers
- Named the key changes
- Made slight tempo changes
*Have begun transcribing the ending solos*
title: Savage
